content.question: Which of the following best explains the cause of the historical development depicted in the image?

choices.label: Workforce shortages led to calls for women to perform jobs previously reserved for men.
Americans developed more liberal attitudes about the proper role of women in the workforce.
New Deal policies encouraged women to pursue educational opportunities in order to stimulate the economy.
White women generally engaged in vocational labor because of the persistence of racism by employers.

content.answer: Workforce shortages led to calls for women to perform jobs previously reserved for men.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
